trans-unit.source: Represents a description of a SOAP message part.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessagePartDescription> class is the parent class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageHeaderDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessagePropertyDescription> and contains the basic functionality of both classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessagePartDescription"></xref> class.
The XML name of the message part.
The XML namespace of the message part.
Gets a value that indicates whether the message part has a value for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessagePartDescription.ProtectionLevel"></xref> property.
`true` if a <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> has been set for this message part; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the index of the message part.
The index of the message part.
Gets or sets the member information for the message part.

If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> is loaded from a class marked by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessagePartDescription.MemberInfo%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=fullName> from which the part was loaded.
The member information for this message part.
Gets or sets a value that controls whether the message part can occur more than once in the message.
`true` if there can be more than one; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the name of the message part.
The name of the message part.
Gets or sets the namespace of the message part.
The namespace of the message part.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> of the message part.
The <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> of the message part.
Gets or sets the type of the message part.
The type of the message part.
